overview: The Burning Moon centers on two bedtime stories that a delinquent  brother reads his kid sister after injecting himself with herion. These disturbingly morbid stories focus on a serial killing blind date and a murderous, psychotic priest. The Burning Moon is notorious for being one of the bloodiest and goriest SOV movies.
tagline: When the moon is full, the blood tide rises.
title: The Burning Moon
